message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good starting point.
I understand you wanting a larger share, but I need a bit more for it to be worthwhile for me. How about this?
I see you're willing to compromise, but I think I can do a bit better. How about 58-42?
This is my final offer, Alice. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  Let's close this out and avoid losing any more to inflation.
I know you said that was your final offer, but I think you'll find this one more appealing than getting nothing. 57-43 is still a good deal considering the inflation.
